messages.message: Invalid transferFunction in basic DFD block. For an sRGB vkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8_SRGB it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
DFD does not match VK_FORMAT w.r.t. sign, float or normalization.
